Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1063 GREAT PLAIN AVENUE, NEEDHAM, 02492, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: NB Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ Capital Market: NBBK) is the holding company for Needham Bank. Founded in 1892, Needham Bank has been helping to build futures for over 130 years throughout Eastern Massachusetts. Over the decades, Needham Bank has established a widespread reputation as "the Builder's Bank" because of our highly regarded expertise in serving area home builders, investors, and developers quickly and efficiently.
